text: Ani tya avasthece smarana kara, jevha tumhi dharativara thode hote kamajora dubale manale jata hote. Ya bhayane rahata hote ki lokanni kadacita tumhala lutuna na ghyave, tevha allahane tumhala rahayala jaga dili ani tumhala apalya madatine samarthya pradana kele, ani tumhala svaccha sud'dha anna-samugri pradana keli, yasathi ki tumhi krtajnata vyakta karavi
